description:
VoltDB is purpose-built OLTP SQL database engine capable of sustaining execution rates of greater than 1 million transactions per second – an open-source product from Mike Stonebraker, original co-founder of Postgres and Ingres.

This BoF session is lead by a VoltDB engineer. It will focus on use-cases for which VoltDB was designed and will explain the key technical underpinnings of VoltDB.

We’re looking forward to an open conversation about VoltDB and are excited to hear your questions, opinions and experiences.
title: Scaling High Performance OLTP With VoltDB
